A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A truly terrible film\, which will resonate through the Star Wars universe. There are too many plot holes\, Disney-mandated plush toy Christmas gifts/characters\, terrible dialogue\, and meandering storylines that make no sense\, to comment upon here.

When I see a Star Wars film\, I expect three\, simple things: 1. This is going to be a rollicking adventure across space; 2. It won't pander. It is an action film. Han always shot first; 3. The storyline will make sense\, is punctuated by witty\, cutting dialogue\, and gives the audience a clear understanding of where we're going\, and why.

The Last Jedi has none of these. .5 stars.
